name: Get Outta My Garbage 4
description:
1v1 local multiplayer game where players race to the middle of the screen, while throwing garbage at each other to fill their opponent's pants to "maximum capacity" and slow them down. Usb controllers required, N64 controllers used for development and best playing experience.

A Game By:

Kent Engel

Adam Kalavsky

Jon Paul Grzybowski

Taylor "Riley" Chadwick

Special Thanks to Logan Hayes for music.
